mapper.select: SELECT B.BID as bId , B.BTITLE as bTitle , B.PRICE as price , B.DEALMETHOD as dealMethod , B.CREATEDATE as createDate , CONCAT(P.URL, '/' || P.UUIDNAME) as url FROM BOARD B RIGHT JOIN PHOTOUPLOAD P ON B.BID = P.BID ORDER BY B.CREATEDATE DESC

SELECT B.BID as bId , B.ACCOUNTID as accId , B.CATEGORYID as cateId , B.BTITLE as bTitle , B.PRICE as price , B.PCONDITION as condt , B.DEALMETHOD as dealMethod , B.CREATEDATE as createDate , CONCAT(P.URL, '/' || P.UUIDNAME) as url , C.CATEGORYNAME as cateName FROM BOARD B RIGHT JOIN PHOTOUPLOAD P ON B.BID = P.BID RIGHT JOIN CATEGORY C ON B.CATEGORYID = C.CATEGORYID WHERE C.CATEGORYID = ${cateId} ORDER BY B.CREATEDATE DESC
